page.title: 12Guides in Markyate
page.content: {MARKYATE GUIDES Markyate Guides meet at the Youth and Community Centre at the bottom of Pickford Hill.It is quite a busy road. We have our meetings every Thursday. The only time we don't have meetings is if the school is on holiday or in Winter if it is really cold.The time of each Meeting is 7.00pm to 8.30pm. The amount of money for subscriptions is 30p per week, even if you are away, as the Hall still has to be paid for. There are four Patrols: Swallows, Bluetits; Canaries and Robins.The games we play are "Ladders"; "Guides from other Counties"; "Names of" and many more. This year is the 75th Anniversary of the Guide Movement so our group is making up 75 different challenges to perform.One week the challenge was to eat a jelly with a pair of chopsticks.
